00030 typedef struct class_t {
00031   dfsch_type_t standard_type;
00032   dfsch_object_t* methods;
00033   dfsch_object_t* send_cache;
00034 } class_t;
00035 
00036 
00037 dfsch_type_t dfsch_class_type = {
00038   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00039   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00040   sizeof(class_t),
00041   "class",
00042 
00043   NULL,
00044   NULL,
00045   NULL,
00046   NULL,
00047 
00048   NULL,
00049   "Metaclass of user-defined classes with message-passing single dispatch"
00050 };
00051 
00052 static dfsch_slot_t* make_slots(dfsch_object_t* slot_desc){
00053   dfsch_object_t* i = slot_desc;
00054   size_t slot_count = dfsch_list_length_check(slot_desc);
00055   dfsch_slot_t* slots = GC_MALLOC((slot_count + 1) * sizeof(dfsch_slot_t));
00056   dfsch_slot_t* j = slots;
00057 
00058   while (slot_count && DFSCH_PAIR_P(i)){
00059     dfsch_object_t* name;
00060     dfsch_object_t* type;
00061     if (DFSCH_PAIR_P(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(i))){
00062       dfsch_object_t* args = DFSCH_FAST_CAR(i);
00063       DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, name);
00064     } else {
00065       name = DFSCH_FAST_CAR(i);
00066     }
00067 
00068     j->type = DFSCH_OBJECT_SLOT_TYPE;
00069     j->name = dfsch_symbol(name);
00070     j->documentation = NULL;
00071 
00072     j++;
00073     slot_count--;
00074     i = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(i);
00075   }
00076 
00077   j->type = NULL;
00078   j->name = NULL;
00079   j->access = DFSCH_SLOT_ACCESS_RW;
00080   j->documentation = NULL;
00081 
00082   return slots;
00083 }
00084 
00085 static size_t adjust_sizes(dfsch_slot_t* slots, size_t parent_size){
00086   if (parent_size < sizeof(dfsch_object_t)){
00087     parent_size = sizeof(dfsch_object_t);
00088   }
00089   while (slots->type){
00090     slots->offset = parent_size;
00091     parent_size += sizeof(dfsch_object_t*);
00092     slots++;
00093   }
00094   return parent_size;
00095 }

00097 static char* class_write(){
00098 
00099 }
00100 static int class_equal_p(dfsch_object_t* a, dfsch_object_t* b){
00101   return dfsch_send(a, dfsch_s_equal_instance_p(), dfsch_cons(b, NULL)) != NULL;
00102 }

00105 static dfsch_object_t* class_apply;
00106 
00107 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_class(dfsch_object_t* superclass,
00108                                  char* name,
00109                                  dfsch_object_t* slots){
00110   class_t* klass = dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_CLASS_TYPE);
00111 
00112   klass->standard_type.superclass = superclass;
00113   klass->standard_type.name = name;
00114   klass->standard_type.slots = make_slots(slots);
00115   klass->standard_type.flags = DFSCH_TYPEF_USER_EXTENSIBLE;
00116   if (superclass){
00117     if (!DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(superclass, DFSCH_CLASS_TYPE)){
00118       dfsch_error("Not a class", superclass);
00119     }
00120 
00121     klass->standard_type.size = adjust_sizes(klass->standard_type.slots,
00122                                              ((dfsch_type_t*)
00123                                               superclass)->size);
00124   } else {
00125     klass->standard_type.size = adjust_sizes(klass->standard_type.slots,
00126                                              sizeof(dfsch_object_t));
00127   }
00128   /* klass->standard_type.equal_p = class_equal_p;
00129   klass->standard_type.write = class_write;
00130   klass->standard_type.apply = class_apply;
00131   klass->standard_type.hash = class_hash;*/
00132 
00133   klass->methods = dfsch_hash_make(DFSCH_HASH_EQ);
00134   klass->send_cache = dfsch_hash_make(DFSCH_HASH_EQ);
00135 
00136   return (dfsch_type_t*)klass;
00137 }
00138 
00139 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_instance(dfsch_object_t* klass,
00140                                     dfsch_object_t* args){
00141   dfsch_object_t* obj;
00142 
00143   if (!DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(klass, DFSCH_CLASS_TYPE)){
00144     dfsch_error("Not a class", klass);
00145   }
00146   obj = dfsch_make_object(klass);
00147   dfsch_send(obj, dfsch_s_initialize_instance(), args);
00148   return obj;
00149 }
00150 
00151 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_find_method(dfsch_object_t* klass, 
00152                                   dfsch_object_t* selector){
00153   dfsch_object_t* method;
00154   class_t* c;
00155   if (!DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(klass, DFSCH_CLASS_TYPE)){
00156     dfsch_error("Not a class", klass);
00157   }
00158   c = (class_t*)klass;
00159 
00160   if (dfsch_hash_ref_fast(c->send_cache, selector, &method)){
00161     return method;
00162   }
00163   
00164   while(DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(c, DFSCH_CLASS_TYPE)){
00165     if (dfsch_hash_ref_fast(c->methods, selector, &method)){
00166       dfsch_hash_set(((class_t*)klass)->send_cache, selector, method);
00167       return method;
00168     }
00169     
00170     c = (class_t*) c->standard_type.superclass;
00171   }
00172 
00173   return NULL;
00174 }
00175 
00176 void dfsch_class_add_method(dfsch_object_t* klass, 
00177                             dfsch_object_t* selector,
00178                             dfsch_object_t* method){
00179   class_t* c;
00180   if (!DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(klass, DFSCH_CLASS_TYPE)){
00181     dfsch_error("Not a class", klass);
00182   }
00183   c = (class_t*)klass;
00184 
00185   dfsch_hash_set(c->methods, selector, method);
00186   dfsch_hash_set(c->send_cache, selector, method);
00187 }
00188 void dfsch_class_remove_method(dfsch_object_t* klass, 
00189                                dfsch_object_t* selector){
00190   class_t* c;
00191   if (!DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(klass, DFSCH_CLASS_TYPE)){
00192     dfsch_error("Not a class", klass);
00193   }
00194   c = (class_t*)klass;
00195 
00196   dfsch_hash_unset(c->methods, selector);
00197   dfsch_hash_unset(c->send_cache, selector);
00198 }
00199 
00200 int dfsch_responds_to_p(dfsch_object_t* klass, 
00201                         dfsch_object_t* selector){
00202   return dfsch_find_method(klass, selector) != NULL;
00203 }
00204 
00205 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_perform_tr(dfsch_object_t* klass,
00206                                  dfsch_object_t* selector,
00207                                  dfsch_object_t* args,
00208                                  dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00209   dfsch_object_t* method = dfsch_find_method(klass, selector);
00210   if (!method){
00211     dfsch_error("Message not understood", dfsch_list(2, klass, selector));
00212   }
00213   return dfsch_apply_tr(method, args, esc);
00214 }
00215 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_perform(dfsch_object_t* klass,
00216                               dfsch_object_t* selector,
00217                               dfsch_object_t* args){
00218   return dfsch_perform_tr(klass, selector, args, NULL);
00219 }
00220 
00221 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_send_tr(dfsch_object_t* obj, 
00222                               dfsch_object_t* selector,
00223                               dfsch_object_t* args,
00224                               dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00225   return dfsch_perform_tr(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(obj), 
00226                           selector, 
00227                           dfsch_cons(obj, args), 
00228                           esc);
00229 }
00230 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_send(dfsch_object_t* obj, 
00231                            dfsch_object_t* selector,
00232                            dfsch_object_t* args){
00233   return dfsch_perform_tr(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(obj), 
00234                           selector, 
00235                           dfsch_cons(obj, args), 
00236                           NULL);
00237 }

00239 DFSCH_SYMBOL_CACHE("initialize-instance", dfsch_s_initialize_instance);
00240 DFSCH_SYMBOL_CACHE("write-instance", dfsch_s_write_instance);
00241 DFSCH_SYMBOL_CACHE("equal-instance?", dfsch_s_equal_instance_p);
00242 DFSCH_SYMBOL_CACHE("apply-instance", dfsch_s_apply_instance);
00243 DFSCH_SYMBOL_CACHE("instance-hash", dfsch_s_instance_hash);

00245 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(send, 0){
00246   dfsch_object_t* object;
00247   dfsch_object_t* selector;
00248   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, object);
00249   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, selector);
00250   return dfsch_send_tr(object, selector, args, esc);
00251 }
00252 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(perform, 0){
00253   dfsch_object_t* klass;
00254   dfsch_object_t* selector;
00255   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, klass);
00256   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, selector);
00257   return dfsch_perform_tr(klass, selector, args, esc);
00258 }
00259 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(find_method, 0){
00260   dfsch_object_t* klass;
00261   dfsch_object_t* selector;
00262   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, klass);
00263   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, selector);
00264   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00265   return dfsch_find_method(klass, selector);  
00266 }
00267 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(responds_to_p, 0){
00268   dfsch_object_t* klass;
00269   dfsch_object_t* selector;
00270   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, klass);
00271   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, selector);
00272   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00273   return dfsch_bool(dfsch_responds_to_p(klass, selector));  
00274 }
00275 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(class_add_method, 0){
00276   dfsch_object_t* klass;
00277   dfsch_object_t* selector;
00278   dfsch_object_t* method;
00279   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, klass);
00280   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, selector);
00281   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, method);
00282   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00283   dfsch_class_add_method(klass, selector, method);  
00284   return NULL;
00285 }
00286 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(class_remove_method, 0){
00287   dfsch_object_t* klass;
00288   dfsch_object_t* selector;
00289   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, klass);
00290   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, selector);
00291   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00292   dfsch_class_remove_method(klass, selector);  
00293   return NULL;
00294 }
00295 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(make_instance, 0){
00296   dfsch_object_t* klass;
00297   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, klass);
00298 
00299   return dfsch_make_instance(klass, args);
00300 }

00302 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(define_class, NULL){
00303   dfsch_object_t* name;
00304   dfsch_object_t* superclass;
00305   dfsch_object_t* slots;
00306   dfsch_object_t* klass;
00307   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, name);
00308   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, superclass);
00309   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, slots);
00310   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00311 
00312   superclass= dfsch_eval(superclass, env);
00313   klass = dfsch_make_class(superclass, 
00314                            dfsch_symbol_2_typename(name),
00315                            slots);
00316 
00317   dfsch_define(name, klass, env);
00318   return klass;
00319 }
00320 DFSCH_DEFINE_FORM_IMPL(define_method, NULL){
00321   dfsch_object_t* klass;
00322   dfsch_object_t* lambda_list;
00323   dfsch_object_t* selector;
00324   dfsch_object_t* code;
00325   dfsch_object_t* method;
00326   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, klass);
00327   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, lambda_list);
00328   DFSCH_ARG_REST(args, code);
00329   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(lambda_list, selector);
00330 
00331   klass = dfsch_eval(klass, env);
00332   method = dfsch_named_lambda(env, lambda_list, code,
00333                               dfsch_list(2, klass, selector));
00334   dfsch_class_add_method(klass, selector, method);
00335   return method;
00336 }

00339 void dfsch__object_native_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){
00340   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<class>", DFSCH_CLASS_TYPE);
00341   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "send", DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(send));
00342   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "perform", DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(perform));
00343   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "responds-to?", DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(responds_to_p));
00344   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "find-method", DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(find_method));
00345   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "class-add-method!", 
00346                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(class_add_method));
00347   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "class-remove-method!", 
00348                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(class_remove_method));
00349   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "make-instance", DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(make_instance));
00350 
00351   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "define-class", DFSCH_FORM_REF(define_class));
00352   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "define-method", DFSCH_FORM_REF(define_method));
00353 }
